mapper.insert: INSERT INTO performance (title, posterUrl, startDate, endDate, duration, ageRating, price, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{posterUrl}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{ageRating}, #{price}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE performance SET title = #{updateRequest.title}, posterUrl = #{updateRequest.posterUrl}, startDate = #{updateRequest.startDate}, endDate = #{updateRequest.endDate}, duration = #{updateRequest.duration}, ageRating = #{updateRequest.ageRating}, price = #{updateRequest.price} WHERE performanceId = #{id}
